A subject guide is designed to inform a particular research topic. These resources can act as a supplement when researching. Ehrman                             Policies                               Access Privileges               Borrowing and Circulation               Code of Conduct               Giving to NYU Health Sciences Library               Privacy Statement                             Careers at NYUHSL               Locations               Contact Us                                                                           Stuart Spore                     Contact Info Title: Head, Bibliometrics & Sr. Systems Advisor   Phone: 212-263-1092   Email: stuart.spore@med.nyu.edu                 Stuart Spore is Head of Bibliometrics and Systems Advisor at the NYU Health Sciences Library. Since 2000 Stuart has taken a lead role in the development and maintenance of the Faculty Bibliography which is the source for institutional faculty publishing metrics at the School of Medicine.   Stuart has a BA in Classics from Marlboro College, an MS in Linguistics from NYU, and an MLIS from the University of Illinois. His research interests include bibliometrics and informatics as it relates to the practical provision of sophisticated library services.
